resources.string: Start with a little run. It will help your body to start blood circulation. Optimal time of run is about 50 minutes.
Its time to use some weight in order to grow your muscles. Just avoid big weights because your body is not strong enough. Do it like 3 times 15
Another important option is plank. This is your exercise for day 3. Try to stay in plank 5 minutes and do it 3 or 4 times depending on your body response
My congratulations. Your current streak is 4 days. Do not forget about calisthenics. It is really important to do this cause it will improve your vessels
This day is a mini rest for you. Just clear your mind and relax cause your brain and soul need this little vacation
Do not stop on your progress. Do more different exercises. No pain, no gain. Break a leg!
It is time to check your results. By the way, do not forget to watch what you are eating. Healthy food is another key option to stay fit. Congrats anyway!
